name: Sabacc
description: A microservice for playing Sabacc in an async way with email notifications

MAILJET_API_KEY_PUBLIC.description: The public API key you got from Mailjet.

MAILJET_API_KEY_PRIVATE.description: The private API key you got from Mailjet.

SENDGRID_API_KEY.description: The API key you got from SendGrid.

SABACC_UI_HREF.description: The URI location of the static UI.
